roles.title: Event Planning & Execution
responsibilities: End-to-End Management: Oversee budgeting, scheduling, and venue setup for all non-technical events.
Stakeholder Coordination: Act as liaison between faculty, speakers, and participants.
Risk Assessment: Plan contingencies for technical or logistical issues.
Post-Event Analysis: Gather feedback and prepare final reports.

roles.title: Public Relations (PR)
responsibilities: External Communication: Draft and send press releases and media advisories.
Brand Management: Maintain the club’s professional image and manage external inquiries.
Guest Relations: Coordinate travel and hospitality for external judges and speakers.

roles.title: Soft Skills & Development
responsibilities: Workshop Design: Create content for sessions on communication, leadership, and negotiation.
Facilitation: Lead mock interviews, group discussions, and team-building exercises.
Mentorship: Provide individualized coaching on presentation skills.

gallery.title: VERBO FIESTA - Verbal Arena
gallery.description: A thrilling showdown testing public speaking, debating, and creative communication skills.

fullDetails.venue: Seminar Hall, Main Block: Room 316, MRCE

description.content: VERBO FIESTA - An Exciting Verbal Arena
VERBO FIESTA is a thrilling verbal showdown where participants battle it out in a series of events aimed at testing their public speaking, debating, and creative thinking skills.

items: Challenges testing debate, creativity, and quick thinking
Certificates and Cash Prizes for top teams.
